Name: Algiers
Description: The capital region, known for its vibrant culture and historical significance.

Name: Oran
Description: A coastal region known for its Mediterranean beaches and historical sites.

Name: Constantine
Description: Known for its historical architecture and mountainous terrain.

Name: Tizi Ouzou
Description: A region known for its beautiful mountains and Kabyle culture.

Name: Sétif
Description: A region known for its agriculture and historical Roman ruins.

Name: Batna
Description: A mountainous region known for its Roman ruins and Berber culture.

Name: Blida
Description: Known for its agricultural activities and proximity to Algiers.

Name: Skikda
Description: A coastal region known for its port and industries.

Name: Médéa
Description: A region with diverse agricultural and industrial production.

Name: El Oued
Description: A desert region known for its oases and ancient history.

Name: Béchar
Description: A region in the southwest, known for its desert landscapes.

Name: Ouargla
Description: Known for its vast desert landscapes and oil resources.

Name: Tamanrasset
Description: Located in the southernmost part of Algeria, known for its Sahara desert.
